data.eml:eml: Two new species of Stenaelurillus Simon, 1886 from India (Araneae: Salticidae: Aelurillina)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prajapati, Dhruv A., Murthappa, Prashanthakumara S., Sankaran, Pradeep M., Sebastian, Pothalil A. (2016): Two new species of Stenaelurillus Simon, 1886 from India (Araneae: Salticidae: Aelurillina). Zootaxa 4171 (2): 321-334, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4171.2.5
